N-TVA; Pten f/f; H11LSL-Cas9 f/f; Ink4a/Arf f/f; ATRX +/+

mouse was loosing mobility in hind legs and I didn't want to chance it over the weekend. I noticed a mass of tissue under the brain, not sure if it was an enlarged cranial nerve or that "necrotic" tissue Zia noticed before. Growing that tissue as a cell line, but too small for fixing it or freezing it as well
